K10D0245_H0246:41b-1: aaru [?] dharma [?] na ma [?] ma ha ya na sh'a h'a [?]/
K10D0245_H0246:41b-3: 'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0245_H0246:42a-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-4: bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro
K10D0245_H0246:42a-5: dha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga brgya
K10D0245_H0246:42a-6: tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
K10D0245_H0246:42a-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-9: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po dang /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-10: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-12: tshe dang ldan pa sgrag can zin bcom ldan 'das
K10D0245_H0246:42a-13: ga la der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0245_H0246:42a-14: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig
K10D0245_H0246:42a-15: tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe
K10D0245_H0246:42a-16: dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0245_H0246:42a-19: chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi na /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-20: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phung po'i tshad ji tsam gyis chos kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-25: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0245_H0246:42a-28: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phung po ni /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-29: brgyad khri bzhi stong du gsungs te /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-31: de la chos thams cad skye ba med pa 'di ni /
K10D0245_H0246:42a-32: chos kyi phung po'i rjes su 'jug pa dang po yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:42b-2: chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K10D0245_H0246:42b-6: skye ba med pa'i chos can dang /
K10D0245_H0246:42b-7: 'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0245_H0246:42b-12: skyes pa'am bud med ces bya ba'i ming mi 'thob cing /
K10D0245_H0246:42b-13: skyes pa'am bud med ces brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:42b-17: skyes pa'am bud med du gdags su med pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0245_H0246:42b-19: de bzhin du chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas
K10D0245_H0246:42b-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0245_H0246:42b-21: chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K10D0245_H0246:42b-22: de'i phyir chos kyis chos rab tu shes so //
K10D0245_H0246:42b-28: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags sbangs pa'ang ma yin la 'dod pa la sten pa'ang ma yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:42b-30: de dag gis bud med sdug gu mthong nas 'dod
K10D0245_H0246:42b-31: chags kyi sems skyes pas za ma'am ma ning rnams
K10D0245_H0246:42b-32: las phal cher byin pa nad kyis btab par 'gyur
K10D0245_H0246:42b-34: byin pa khar ba lta bur 'gyur /
K10D0245_H0246:42b-39: ma ning gang yin pa de la ma 'gyel /
K10D0245_H0246:42b-40: de'i las la mtshon gyis ma btab par ci'i phyir de dag byin pa na bar 'gyur snyam /
K10D0245_H0246:43a-2: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0245_H0246:43a-6: btsun mo'i 'khor srung ba lags te /
K10D0245_H0246:43a-7: de dag bud med sdug gu mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems skye lags so //
K10D0245_H0246:43a-8: de dag 'dod chags kyi sems kyis nyon mongs pa khol bar 'gyur te /
K10D0245_H0246:43a-9: nyon mongs pa khol ba de dag gi lus khu
K10D0245_H0246:43a-10: chus rgyas par gyur pas de dag 'dod chags kyi
K10D0245_H0246:43a-11: gdung bas gdungs pa na byin pa shin tu gas
K10D0245_H0246:43a-13: de ltar de dag gi lus ma rungs par 'gyur lags so //
K10D0245_H0246:43a-14: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:43a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0245_H0246:43a-17: za ma'am ma ning las gang dag bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba ni /
K10D0245_H0246:43a-19: phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0245_H0246:43a-21: dge sbyong sh'akya'i bu rnams las gang dag 'dod chags
K10D0245_H0246:43a-22: kyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur ba'i khyad par la ltos
K10D0245_H0246:43a-27: mi gtsang bar shes nas de dag 'dod pa rnams
K10D0245_H0246:43a-28: kyis skyo zhing yid byung la mngon par mi dga'
K10D0245_H0246:43a-29: nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de /
K10D0245_H0246:43a-30: bzhin dang 'phral ba'i mdangs gsal ba yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:43b-0: sh'a @43b ri'i bu; skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyis ni /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-1: skyo ba'am yid 'byung bar mi nus so //
K10D0245_H0246:43b-4: 'di ltar skyes bu ngan pa de dag ni /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-5: 'dod pa la kun tu rtog pa rnams kyis kun tu rtog pa rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0245_H0246:43b-7: skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyis kun tu rtog pa rnams gang zhe na /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-8: gang dag med pa la rtog par byed pa ste /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-9: mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar rtog par byed /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-10: 'du shes med pa la 'du shes su rtog par byed /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-11: bud med la bud med du rtog par byed /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-12: 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas par rtog par byed pa ste /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-14: de lta bu de dag ni /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-15: skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyi kun tu rtog pa rnams yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:43b-18: za ma dang ma ning 'dod pas zin pa rnams
K10D0245_H0246:43b-19: kyi las rnams yin te; de dag skyes bu dam
K10D0245_H0246:43b-23: ma ning gang la la zhig skyes bu ngan pa
K10D0245_H0246:43b-24: rnams kyi kun tu rtog pa de lta bu dag
K10D0245_H0246:43b-25: la kun tu rtog par byed pa ni /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-27: zhes nyams su myong bar byed de /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-28: bu ga dgu'i sgo dang ldan pa 'di mi gtsang
K10D0245_H0246:43b-29: ba 'dzag pa 'di la gtsang bar 'du shes skyed
K10D0245_H0246:43b-30: par byed do // 'di dag thams cad ni /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-31: bya ba ma yin pa ste /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-33: skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams ma yin no /
K10D0245_H0246:43b-36: bram ze gang la la dag 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs
K10D0245_H0246:44a-0: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi @44a
K10D0245_H0246:44a-2: bud med pa kun tu rtag cing mig la mtshan mar 'dzun par byed de /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-3: beed'urya lta bu'i 'du shes su byed la chu'i dbu
K10D0245_H0246:44a-4: ba bzhin du 'du shes su ni mi byed do
K10D0245_H0246:44a-10: 'brangs pas lus stong par 'gyur zhing lus las sha ma mi gtsang ba /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-12: blta bar bya ba ma yin pa 'byung ngo //
K10D0245_H0246:44a-14: mig kyang de dang 'dra bar brjod de /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-19: khyi mo'i sha ma dang 'dra bar mig kyang de bzhin 'dug ste /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-20: mig gi 'bras bu'i nang de ni /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-21: chu'i chu bur lta bur 'dug go /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-22: de ltar mi gtsang ba 'byung zhing de ltar mi mthun pa ste /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-23: rnag dang khrag rab tu 'dzag cing mi gtsang ba rab tu 'dzag go /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-25: mi gtsang ba rnag dang khrag rab tu 'dzag cing
K10D0245_H0246:44a-26: chu'i snying po 'dzag pa'i lus la chags pa gang
K10D0245_H0246:44a-27: yin pa de lta bu ni /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-28: mig ces brjod do; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-29: 'di la rgyu gang gis mig ces bya ba de'i rgyu ni /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-34: lus kyi gtso bo yin te /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-35: gzugs la blta bas thog ma dang /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-37: mthar ngoms pa med la lus kyis mi dge ba rgya mtsho snyed byed de /
K10D0245_H0246:44a-38: rgyu des na mig ces bya'o //
K10D0245_H0246:44a-40: 'di la gang gis na de mig ces bya ba'i rgyu ni /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-0: gang zhe @44b na; mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0245_H0246:44b-2: mig gi mi mthun pa de gang zhe na /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-3: gang gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-4: tshor ba med pa la tshor bar 'du shes pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-7: rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'o //
K10D0245_H0246:44b-8: yang 'di la rgyu gang gis de mig ces bya ba'i rgyu ni /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-11: 'dis dge ba spyod pa nyams par byed de /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-12: rgyu des na mig ces bya'o //
K10D0245_H0246:44b-13: 'dis dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par byed pas na mig ces bya'o //
K10D0245_H0246:44b-17: ther zug ma yin pa ste /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-18: rgyu des na mig ces bya bar shes par bya'o //
K10D0245_H0246:44b-22: zhum pa med pa rnams kyis ni /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-28: gang zag ma yin pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-30: de bzhin du sbyar te rna ba dang /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-42: phung po lnga la phyin ci log pa las byung ba'o /
K10D0245_H0246:44b-44: dge slong [?] kha cig 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes
K10D0245_H0246:44b-45: dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du
K10D0245_H0246:44b-46: rab tu mi shes pa de dag ni /
K10D0245_H0246:45a-0: @45a *// 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas gdungs par 'gyur la /
K10D0245_H0246:45a-1: kha dog ngan cing skya skya bor 'gyur ro //
K10D0245_H0246:45a-5: shing ljon pa chen po'i lo ma'am /
K10D0245_H0246:45a-6: ljon pa'i 'bras bu smin pa 'brul ba'i tshe skya bor 'gyur ro //
K10D0245_H0246:45a-8: de bzhin du dge slong ngam /
K10D0245_H0246:45a-11: dge bsnyen ma gang dag kha cig 'dod pa rnams
K10D0245_H0246:45a-12: kyi nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
K10D0245_H0246:45a-13: du rab tu mi shes pa de dag ni /
K10D0245_H0246:45a-14: 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas gdungs bar 'gyur; kha dog ngan par 'gyur /
K10D0245_H0246:45a-16: kha dog ngan cing blta na mi sdug par 'gyur ro //
K10D0245_H0246:45a-18: dge slong gang dag gsar bu dar la bab pa;
K10D0245_H0246:45a-19: gzhon nu rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon
K10D0245_H0246:45a-21: 'dod pa rnams dngos po med do //
K10D0245_H0246:45a-22: zhes 'dod pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K10D0245_H0246:45a-23: 'dod pa'i rtog pa skyes na'ang myur ba nyid du rab tu zhi bar byed de //
K10D0245_H0246:45a-24: de dag mi dge ba yin par shes par yang byed /
K10D0245_H0246:45a-27: dge slong dag gis 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs
K10D0245_H0246:45a-28: mthong nas 'dod pa de dag las yid 'byung bar
K10D0245_H0246:45a-29: byed / 'dod chags dang bral bar byed de /
K10D0245_H0246:45a-30: mngon par dga' nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-0: bzhin dang @45b 'phral ba'i mdangs gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0245_H0246:45b-4: mi zhig gi lus la nad kyis thebs la rnag smin nas de'i yan lag dang /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-5: nyid lag thams cad la rma'i kha brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-6: rma'i kha re re la'ang srin bu'i tshogs brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-7: de dag mchu rno zhing mchu kha gnyis na yod la /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-8: kha zas yongs su zos pa rnams kyis tshim par mi 'gyur zhing /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-9: de ma dag ma spungs pa'i drung du 'dug na /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-10: ji tsam na srog chags de dag mes gdungs par gyur ba dang /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-11: de la phyir zhing za bar byed /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-12: yongs su za bar byed na /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-13: sh'a ri'i bu; 'di ji snyam du sems /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-14: mi de srog chags de dag gis zos pa yin nam /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-16: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-17: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0245_H0246:45b-20: 'di thos pa nyid kyis lus kyi spu zing zhes bgyid par gyur na /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-21: mi de'i mi mthun pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-23: mi de ni; srog chags kyi rigs de dag gis 'tshal ba lags kyi /
K10D0245_H0246:45b-26: de srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag
K10D0245_H0246:45b-27: gis lus g-ya' bar bgyid cing 'di [?] ra bzhi
K10D0245_H0246:45b-29: bde ba jo [?] mi bgyid pa lags so /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-0: mi de'i lus la rnag dang khrag 'dzag cing de lta bur gyur pa de smad par @46a *//
K10D0245_H0246:46a-5: blta bar mi 'os pa lags so //
K10D0245_H0246:46a-8: de bzhin du dge slong mkhas pa dag ni /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-9: 'di la so so yang dag par slob ste /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-15: nyon mongs pa khol ba'i bud med de dag bstan par bya ba ma yin te /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-24: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to snyam mo //
K10D0245_H0246:46a-26: skyes pa'i lus la yod pa lta bu ma yin pa /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-27: bud med la ches lhag pa srin bu'i tshogs lnga yod de /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-29: srin bu'i tshogs lnga po de dag ni /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-30: bud med kyi gci ba'i lam na gnas te /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-31: srin bu'i tshogs re re la srin bu brgyad cu brgyad cu yod la /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-32: mchu rno zhing mchu kha gnyis na yod de /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-33: de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud med kyi lus la za'o //
K10D0245_H0246:46a-34: des na nyon mongs pa dag gis bud med log par g-yem spyod ste /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-35: 'dod pa yongs su spyod pa dag gis ngoms mi myong ngo //
K10D0245_H0246:46a-39: nyes dmigs yin par mthong na /
K10D0245_H0246:46a-40: de dag 'dod pa rnams las yid 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-1: mngon par dga' nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing bzhin dang 'phral ba'i mdangs gsal ba yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:46b-4: 'dod pa'i phung po las brtsams nas chos bstan pa yin te /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-6: 'dod pa yongs su spyod pa dag las yid 'byung bar bya'o //
K10D0245_H0246:46b-8: kun nas nyon mongs pa gang zhe na /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-10: kun nas nyon mongs pa ni /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-14: rnam par zhi ba gang zhe na /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-20: kun nas nyon mongs pa ni /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-24: chos su 'du shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o //
K10D0245_H0246:46b-25: chos su 'du shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang zhe na /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-26: 'di lta ste; skye bar 'du shes pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-29: bdag med par bdag tu bdu shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yod de /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-31: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal to //
K10D0245_H0246:46b-33: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-40: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
K10D0245_H0246:46b-41: zhes rlom sems su byed de /
K10D0245_H0246:46b-42: rlom sems su byed na 'ching ngo //
K10D0245_H0246:46b-43: rlom sems su mi byed na grol lo //
K10D0245_H0246:47a-1: pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-5: tshul khrims 'chal pa'i chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa yin te; bcu gang zhe na /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-7: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe gdung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-8: dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa 'gyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-9: mnar med par 'gro'o; ;zhes 'khor gyi nang na 'dug na skrag pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-10: bdag nyid tshul khrims la skur ba 'debs pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-12: sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-14: nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-16: lha rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa'i [?] snyam pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-17: 'chi ba'i tshe 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-19: mi'i lus thob par dka' ba'o //
K10D0245_H0246:47a-22: dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa ste /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-24: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe gdung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0245_H0246:47a-26: de lta bas na 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K10D0245_H0246:47a-28: 'di la dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa'am /
K10D0245_H0246:47a-31: bla gab med pa na gnas pa ni /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-7: bshang bas yongs su gang ba'i ro lta bu'o; ;zhes de ltar so sor yang dag par slob bo //
K10D0245_H0246:47b-9: byis pa 'phyar ba'i spyod yul yin te /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-11: bud med la bsten pa dang bsnyen pas chog go /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-13: bud med kyi lus phyis dang mchil mas yongs su gang ba de la su zhig dga' ste /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-16: 'jig rten gyi khyi ro rul pa dang 'dra bar smad par bya ba yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:47b-23: mdog mi sdug cing sngo la pags pa mugs pa /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-24: srog chags kyis yongs su gang ba zhig lam ga na snang la /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-25: de'i steng na char pa'ang bab cing de rlung gis kyang kun nas btab /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-26: der mi rnams kyang kun nas 'khor bar gyur te /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-27: de dag gis dri de tshor na /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-30: mi de dag dri mi zhim pa de snom par byed dam /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-36: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0245_H0246:47b-40: khyi ro de la rig par byed dam /
K10D0245_H0246:47b-42: mngon par dga' bar byed na /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-0: de skye bo mang pos bsngags par by @48a *//
K10D0245_H0246:48a-2: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-3: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0245_H0246:48a-5: mi de ni; blta bar dka' ste /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-6: de la bsngags par ga la bgyid /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-7: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0245_H0246:48a-10: khyi ro de la 'khyud par byed pa'am /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-12: mngon par dga' ba'i mi de la ni /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-13: de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa mdzad kyi /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-14: gang zhig bud med yul gyi bzang mo na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa'am /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-19: nu ma rgyas pas mdzes pa /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-23: nad dang bral ba de la tha na rkang pa'i
K10D0245_H0246:48a-24: mthe bos reg par byed pa'i mi de la ni
K10D0245_H0246:48a-25: / de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags par mi mdzad de /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-27: yul gyi bzang mo de la tha na rkang ba'i
K10D0245_H0246:48a-28: mthe bos reg par byed pa'i mi gang zag de
K10D0245_H0246:48a-30: shin tu smad par bya ba yin te /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-31: khyi ro de la 'khyud par byed pa'am /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-33: mngon par dga' bar byed pa ni /
K10D0245_H0246:48a-38: reg pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ram /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-5: 'di ltar dge slong gis 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K10D0245_H0246:48b-8: dge slong gis lus la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya zhe na /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-14: bud med kyi lus la ni /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-15: skyes pa'i lus la yod pa lta bu ma yin
K10D0245_H0246:48b-16: pa ches lhag pa srin bu'i tshogs nyi shu rtsa
K10D0245_H0246:48b-17: lnga yod de / sh'a ri'i bu /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-18: bud med kyi mgo klad pa'i nang na srin bu'i tshogs 'phrog byed ces bya ba dag yod de /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-19: de dag bud med kyi klad pa la za bar byed do //
K10D0245_H0246:48b-21: bud med kyi sna'i nang na srin bu'i tshogs kha rdzogs zhes bya ba dag yod de /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-22: de dag bud med kyi kha spu la za ste /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-23: des na bud med la kha spu mi skye'o //
K10D0245_H0246:48b-24: sh'a ri'i bu; bud med kyi rna khung na srin
K10D0245_H0246:48b-25: bu'i tshogs za bar byed pa zhes bya ba ngag
K10D0245_H0246:48b-26: yod de / de dag bud med kyi rna ba
K10D0245_H0246:48b-27: la za zhing bud med kyi rna ba 'bigs par
K10D0245_H0246:48b-28: yod de / byed do // sh'a ri'i bu /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-29: bud med kyi mgrin pa'i mtshams dang /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-30: mgo bo'i mtshams la srin bu'i tshogs zhen byed ces bya ba dag yod de /
K10D0245_H0246:48b-31: de dag bud med kyi rna ba za zhing bud
K10D0245_H0246:48b-32: med kyi rna ba 'bigs par byed la mig kyang
K10D0245_H0246:48b-34: sh'a ri'i bu; skyes pa'i rna ba la mi 'bigs kyi bud med kyi rna ba la 'bigs so //
K10D0245_H0246:48b-36: bud med la srin bu'i tshogs aa ba re ba na zhes bya ba dag yod de /
K10D0245_H0246:49a-0: de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud @49a *//
K10D0245_H0246:49a-1: med kyi kha la za ste /
K10D0245_H0246:49a-2: des na bud med kyi mgul dma' ba yin te /
K10D0245_H0246:49a-5: bza' ba dang bca' ba khar bcug ma thag tu thog mar de dag za bar byed do //
K10D0245_H0246:49a-6: de dag nyal nyil bud med kyi nu ma'i nang du 'jog ste /
K10D0245_H0246:49a-7: des na bud med nu ma 'phyang ba yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:49a-8: gang gi tshe bud med sbrum par gyur pa de'i
K10D0245_H0246:49a-9: tshe srin bu de dag kyang sbrum par gyur te
K10D0245_H0246:49a-10: / des na bud med kyi nu zho mang ba yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:49a-12: bud med kyi lus kyi nang mngal gyi gnas gang
K10D0245_H0246:49a-13: na mngal yod pa'i phyogs de na srin bu zad
K10D0245_H0246:49a-14: par byed pa dpa' ba zhes bya ba dag yod
K10D0245_H0246:49a-15: de / de dag srin bu rab tu ldag byed ces bya ba dag bsad nas za'o //
K10D0245_H0246:49a-16: de dag srin bu rab tu ldag byed de dag ma rnyed na de dag kyang 'chi'o //
K10D0245_H0246:49a-17: srin bu'i tshogs de gnyis ka shi ste med pa dang /
K10D0245_H0246:49a-18: pha ma 'dus pa las mngal chags par 'gyur ro //
K10D0245_H0246:49a-20: bud med kyi lus la lus kyi nang skye gnas kyi sgo na srin bu'i tshogs bzhi yod de /
K10D0245_H0246:49a-22: mchu mchog ces bya ba dang /
K10D0245_H0246:49a-23: gong bu sbed ces bya ba dang /
K10D0245_H0246:49a-26: de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud med kyi lus la za ste /
K10D0245_H0246:49a-27: des na bud med nyon mongs pa rnams kyis shin
K10D0245_H0246:49a-28: tu 'bar bar byas te 'dod pa yongs su spyad
K10D0245_H0246:49a-29: pas mi ngoms pa yin no //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas bud med kyi @49b skyon ches
K10D0245_H0246:49b-1: lhag pa de dag mkhyen nas bslab pa'i gzhi lhag
K10D0245_H0246:49b-2: pa dang bca' bar mdzad do //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-4: chos kyi phung po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang
K10D0245_H0246:49b-5: dang yang du 'khor bzhi po dag la ston cig
K10D0245_H0246:49b-8: smad par bya ba yin par shes par 'gyur /
K10D0245_H0246:49b-10: smad par bya ba yin par shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-12: de ltar lus 'di bcos ma yin par shes nas
K10D0245_H0246:49b-13: byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi
K10D0245_H0246:49b-14: ldan pa ma gtogs par su zhig 'dod pa rnams
K10D0245_H0246:49b-20: lus 'di la mngon par dga' bar mi bya /
K10D0245_H0246:49b-21: lhag par chags par mi bya'o //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te /
K10D0245_H0246:49b-23: bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas de bzhin
K10D0245_H0246:49b-24: du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal
K10D0245_H0246:49b-25: to // lus ni mi gtsang las byung ste //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-26: rtag tu srog chags rnams kyang gnas //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-27: gcin dang rtug pas rab gang na //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-28: de la byis pa rab tu chags /
K10D0245_H0246:49b-29: dge slong ba dang dge slong ma //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-30: dge bsnyen pha dang dge bsnyen ma //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-32: 'dod chags bral nas rnam par grol //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-33: chos dang ldan pa rnams la ni //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-34: nyes pa 'di dag ngas ma bstan //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-35: gang dag 'dod la longs spyod pa //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-36: de dag la ni skyon rnams bshad //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-37: sangs rgyas kyis ni bstan pa bzhin //
K10D0245_H0246:49b-38: bud med mthong na su rtog ste //
K10D0245_H0246:50a-2: mkhas pa de dag rtog mi byed /
K10D0245_H0246:50a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0245_H0246:50a-6: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang
K10D0245_H0246:50a-7: ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
K10D0245_H0246:50a-8: bstod do // 'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0245_H0246:50a-9: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a warma dang /
